commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas3afae75"

diff:
"3afae75 Bug 394615: 0 byte downloads don't appear in the download manager, patch by Edward Lee <edilee@gmail.com>, r=sdwilsh
diff --git a/toolkit/components/downloads/src/nsDownloadManager.h b/toolkit/components/downloads/src/nsDownloadManager.h
index 17b77ee..d760a59 100644
--- a/toolkit/components/downloads/src/nsDownloadManager.h
+++ b/toolkit/components/downloads/src/nsDownloadManager.h
@@ -162,6 +162,7 @@ protected:
   static PRBool IsInFinalStage(DownloadState aState)
   {
     return aState == nsIDownloadManager::DOWNLOAD_NOTSTARTED ||
+           aState == nsIDownloadManager::DOWNLOAD_QUEUED ||
            aState == nsIDownloadManager::DOWNLOAD_DOWNLOADING;
   }
 
"
